subject: Dogs
lead_paragraph: While hip replacement surgery for larger dogs has been around since the mid-1970s, hip replacement surgery for smaller dogs like Lily who weigh between 6 and 30 lbs, only became available in 2006.
snippet: While hip replacement surgery for larger dogs has been around since the mid-1970s, hip replacement surgery for smaller dogs like Lily who weigh between 6 and 30 lbs, only became available in 2006.
